Fresh, Local Catering Made Simple

DELIVERY OPTIONS

Indy Fresh can deliver breakfast, lunch, or dinner to your work, location, or private residence. We serve all of Central Indiana so please give us a call to find out more info on your specific destination. Orders of $150 or more receive free delivery within the I-465 perimeter. Don't see your city? For exact delivery fee, contact Lisa at (317) 605-1200.

Free Delivery Within I-465 Perimeter

  • Carmel
  • Fishers

WHY INDY FRESH?

SMART

Indy Fresh does one thing and we do it well. Catering. We make incredible food with affordable prices. We are a commercial kitchen that doesn't incur the expense of running a full service restaurant and that is how we pass the value onto you. Indy Fresh splurges where it counts. We use only high quality, fresh ingredients that we create in-house every day. Indy Fresh Catering offers bundled menu items to cater to any event at any price point. What a fresh idea!

LOCAL

We are from Indy, we live in Indy and we are just as passionate about our food as we are our hometown. Indy Fresh is a local full-service catering company that prepares fresh meals with fresh ingredients every day. Indy Fresh Catering delivers to all of Central Indiana. We are proud to be your hometown, local catering company delivering fresh made to order food every day.

FABULOUS

Your meeting, your event, or your wedding needs to be great. We are seasoned catering professionals! We know it has to be on-time, delicious and nothing short of fabulous. Our Award Winning Chef Scott Vogel...who coincidentally has an Aeronautical Engineering to go along with his Culinary Degree, combined both the art and science of food to create fabulous food for any event.

HOW WE SERVE OUR FOOD
Buffet

A delicious fresh meal consisting of several dishes which guests serve themselves

Stations

Dinner service consisting of multiple buffets setup as stations throughout your event

Drop & Go

Food items in disposable pans that includes serving utensils and tableware


Boxed Lunches

Light meals packed in a small container

Butler Service

Formal way to serve food at a cocktail party


COMMUNITY PARTNERS

Indy Fresh Catering loves to help our local Indianapolis communities and businesses. Indy Fresh Catering is proud to give our time and service to our local community. Indy Fresh loves to see local businesses (like us) thrive on our community.
